summary.Title: SENIOR BACKEND DEVELOPER
summary.Presentation: Thousands of clients in over 50 countries worldwide depend on Paperturn toprovide them with the online flipbook platform they know and love. In the last 5years, Paperturn has grown exponenti

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Thousands of clients in over 50 countries worldwide depend on Paperturn to
provide them with the online flipbook platform they know and love. In the last 5
years, Paperturn has grown exponentially, receiving its first Børsen Gazelle award
in 2020, a second Gazelle in 2021, as well as Technology Denmark’s Workplace
Diversity Award for most multicultural places to work in Odense. We were also the
first flipbook provider in the world to offer digital documents for people with
disabilities. We are a progressive company, and we’re growíng!

We are now looking for a seasoned backend engineer to build and manage
our backend infrastructure in PHP and Lumen (Laravel). Our new developer
should be able to effortlessly manage a large, complex system and will be the
champion of suggesting and developing better ways of doing things from an
architecture standpoint. Clean and structured code is a must! Our new team
member will coordinate with the rest of the development team working on
various levels of the infrastructure.

Main Responsibilities
● Design and construction of our REST API
● Design and deployment of our database systems
● Ensuring the entire stack is designed and built for speed and scalability
● Design and implementation of continuous integration and deployment


Required Skills:
● PHP with at least three years of full-time experience
● Laravel / Lumen with at least two years of experience with the framework
● MySQL / MariaDB Database design and management, including being up
on the latest practices and associated versions
● REST API
● Payment Gateways (Braintree / Stripe)
● External APIs of different external services like AWS (S3, Cloudfront,
Lambda), Mailchimp, Sendgrid etc.
● Server deployment Server management and deployment for the relevant
environment
● Unit testing Experience implementing testing platforms and unit tests
● GIT
● Documenting Ability to write clean and well documented code

Nice to have (Optional):
● NodeJS
● DynamoDB
● Ubuntu
● Docker
● Frontend Javascript and ReactJS

Company Culture
We’re small, but big. We’re intrapreneurs. We work in English. We all have our
“eyes on the prize”. We’re “do-ers”. We all strive for greatness. We respect each
other. We laugh a lot and are competitive in our daily foosball matches. We’re the
Paperturn family. Come, join us.


Working Hours, Location and Salary
------------------------------------
We are a company based in Denmark. To maintain teamwork, you need to be
available during Danish office hours. Availability during 09:00 to 15:00 Danish time
(08:00 - 12:00 UTC) is mandatory.
-----------------------------------

Diversity at Paperturn
Equality and diversity are core values at Paperturn and are more than just words
to us. Inside our walls, we strive to create a workplace where everyone feels
empowered to bring their full, authentic selves to work. Our hiring & lifecycle
processes are designed to prevent discrimination against our people, regardless
of gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, age,
neurodiversity, disability status, citizenship, or any other aspect which makes
them unique. We are #ThePaperturnFamily.

How to Apply
Apply with a tailored CV and motivated cover letter to:
Lars Reffstrup, Technical Manager at lar@paperturn.com.

Want some more info about us? Visit www.paperturn.com
